title: Just had a very likely bot in my ranked game, but that's not what grinds my gears.
body:
Everyone on both teams agreed it was a bot and regardless if it was or wasn't.... when asked to report a guy said "What's the point?  It's just a bot; no use getting angry over."

Out of all the things we can get peeved about.  Isn't bots in ranked one of the legit ones?
